```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
cvrisk_url = "https://data.cdc.gov/api/views/6vp6-wxuq/rows.csv?accessType=DOWNLOAD"
cvrisk = 
  read.csv(url(cvrisk_url)) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  as_tibble()

measures = cvrisk %>% 
  select(measure) %>% 
  distinct()
```
